title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 205.12 - Standard thread for fire service use in the State of New York
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 205.12 - Standard thread for fire service use in the State of New York

State Regulations
(a) Pursuant to the requirement of law in
subdivision 4 of section
209-e
of the General Municipal Law, the "American National Standard" thread as
hereinafter set out in full, is hereby prescribed as the standard thread for
the State. (b) The thread standards
of the State of New York are those of the National Bureau of Standards, U.S. Department of Commerce, Washington, D.C. The standards are the same as those
presented by the National Fire Protection Association, the National Board of

Fire Underwriters and the American Standards Association. Click
to view image
